basicInfo.name: Noho
basicInfo.flavor: Noho started to record the tale of the current Seven Knights and followed the tale of Evan's expedition through Yui's songs.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 50% of Magic Attack plus 12% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Magic Attack plus 14% of the caster's Max HP.

Skill 1.name: Righting the Record
Skill 1.desc:
2 Enemies
 - 25% HP Alteration
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: HP Alteration to 25%.

Skill 2.name: Tome of Destruction
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack plus 19% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 2 Buff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Magic Attack plus 22% of the caster's Max HP.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: 100% chance to inflict 16% All Attack Reduction. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

Passive.name: Mightier than the Sword
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Magic Attack Boost to 23%.
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 32% of the caster's Max HP upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Books, history, studying, members of Elderkrupp, Jupy, apples, her self-written records, pens, paper, neutrality, objective perspectives, curiosity
profile.dislikes: Biased tendencies, lies, snakes, foolishness, wrongful beliefs
profile.story: Noho started to record the tale of the current Seven Knights and followed the tale of Evan's expedition through Yui's songs.

basicInfo.name: Noho
basicInfo.flavor: Noho developed an interest in the tales of the Seven Knights from reading about them in one of her books. Her glasses, paper, and pen are her most prized possessions.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 45% of Magic Attack plus 11% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 45% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.name: Tome of Destruction
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Magic Attack plus 17% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Physical Attack.

Passive.name: Mightier than the Sword
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

profile.story: Noho developed an interest in the tales of the Seven Knights from reading about them in one of her books. Her glasses, paper, and pen are her most prized possessions.

basicInfo.name: Noho
basicInfo.flavor: Noho's parents instilled a love of books in her, and she often heard that she was smarter than her peers. She loved reading so much that even her parents tried to get her to stop.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 40% of Magic Attack plus 10% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 40% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies (By Highest No. of Buffs)
 - Deals damage equal to 65% of Magic Attack plus 16% of the caster's Max HP 1 time(s).
 - 100% chance to inflict 1 Buff Removal(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 65% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Magic Attack Boost. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
